title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Feel the science !
text:
This website contains lots of cool stuff about it’s creator and subject i.e. ME, and even more interesting stories about science and how it makes us feel.
To learn more about me, go to the About page. In Projects, you’ll find some work I’ve contributed to, along with the tech stack I’ve mastered over the years. And for the most fun stuff, go to Blog where you’ll find a curated list of articles. I hope you’ll enjoy !

title: About
text:
Hi there ! I’m Des, a PhD student in HPC-AI at the University of Bristol. I’m investigating parallel algorithms for combined data-driven and physics-informed simulation, control, and 3D reconstruction from fluid flows.
My research interests are at the intersection of Machine Learning, Scientific Computing, and High Performance Computing. They include:

How to best combine classical knowledge of physical systems with AI approaches ?
How to scale existing physics-based AI techniques to real-world engineering problems: this involves questions like strong/weak scaling and uncertainty quantification.
What role do humans, and domain scientists in particular play in the envisionned symbiose above?

To learn more about me, you can consult the list of projects I’ve been involved in. Also, here’s a link to a short version of my CV. Ever better, send me a message !
